summary: This mod adds 3 rather nasty looking swords into the game that are part of a weapon set I\'m working on (\"Lilith\'s Tools\").
descriptionHtml:
[size=30]This mod has been remade => [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14906]Lilith\'s Disemboweler[/url]. I will no longer update / offer support for this file.[/size]





Updates:
=========================================================================================



New textures and mesh tweaks in making:
---------------------------------
- something like on my newest mod (lilith\'s decapitator)
-> lighter color(so you can actually see something else than black), more detail and more

- Will make a new handle mesh if nothing else


Lilith\'s Slasher 2h Standalone version:
----------------------------------------------------
This mod adds a 2-handed version of the Lilith\'s Slasher. 

The swordscan be crafted through daedric smithing and requires considerably more materials than basic daedric crafts mainly thanks to its high stats.

*
THIS MOD IS A STANDALONE THUS NOT NEEDING THE ORIGINAL MOD TO FUNCTION

If you have the original one installed as well you will not have to use the textures in this file since they\'re using the same ones.
*
=========================================================================================

Lilith\'s Cleavers
---------------------



Description:
- - - - - - - - 
Latest version: 1.0

.....................................................................................................................................

(Lilith\'s Razor - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11908]Link[/url])

(Lilith\'s Cleavers - This mod)

Lilith\'s Disemboweler - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14906]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Decapitator -[url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13416]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Reaver -  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15969]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Sickle -  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22368]Link[/url]

More weapons coming up including dagger, and more! Even maybe an armor set when the stars are aligned!
......................................................................................................................................



This mod adds 3 rather nasty looking swords into the game that are part of a weapon set I\'m working on (\"Lilith\'s Tools\").

These swords have different sizes and their stats have been modified accoringly. They are more powerful than skyrim vanilla weapons but should not be overpowered.

The swords can be crafted through daedric smithing and require considerably more materials than basic daedric crafts mainly thanks to their high stats. 

Note: About the textures

The mod comes with 3 sets of textures that have different resolution:

lowrestextures: Quite bad quality, non-existent loading time 500x1250

midrestextures: Pretty good quality, smallish loading time 1000x2500

superrestextures: maximal quality, long loading time 2000x5000

Take these choises into account if you\'re changing weapons a lot or your pc\'s hardware is not up to date.

Installion:
- - - - - - 

1. dump the meshes and the .esp file into your data folder. Merge folders if asked (provided that you know what you\'re doing, of course)

2. Open one of the texture folders (depending on what textures you wish to use) and put its contents to your data folder. Again, merge if asked.

3. Boot skyrim and do a barrelroll. In other words check the .esp file. 

and now it should work.


Uninstallion:
- - - - - - - - -

Just remove the files you added.
author: wiikki
